profil.title: Hello, I am Yifan
profil.description:
Full-stack developer with hands-on experience in designing and developing web applications within an agile team.

I am currently looking for a professional opportunity as a Developer. I am available immediately, flexible to relocate anywhere in France, and hold a valid residence permit (APS) allowing me to work in France.

I am also open to opportunities across other European Union countries.

master.title: Master MIAGE (Applied IT Methods for Business Management)
master.university: Faculty of Computer Science | University of Toulouse 1 Capitole (UT1)
master.courses: Main Courses: Web application development, Information systems analysis and design (UML), Business process modeling (BPMN), Object-oriented programming (JAVA), Agile project management
master.courses2: Main Courses: Website design (HTML, CSS, JS), OLAP (SAP-PO, Power BI), Database development (MySQL, Oracle), Structured programming (Python)

preparatory.university: Faculty of Computer Science | University of Toulouse 1 Capitole (UT1)
